name: Four-Wheels-Drive
description:
Four-Wheels-Drive

Four Wheels, One Dream. Co-op with the other 4 wheels to deliver an expecting Lady to the Hospital

For GMTK Jam 2020. Theme: **Out of Control**

How to play

1. Go to https://vicksonzero.itch.io/four-wheels-drive
   - Web version has performance issue but can download PC version later
2. Use **R/F** and **E/D** to control the left side
3. Use **U/J** and **I/K** to control the other side
4. Drive in opposite direction to brake!
5. It's a tank too, use opposite wheel directions to turn in place!
6. Use mouse to grab power-ups (if i have time to put it in)
7. Find the hospital in this town!

Non-US keyboards you can still try play the PC version, but no Hints sorry

## Credits

3D Assets:  Simple City Pack by CreativeMinds
BGM: Royalty Free Music from Bensound
Car Physics: github/coderDarren/Unity3D-Cars.git
Camera: cinemachine
Gameplay: Dickson (Me)
